column3: I'll get {{c1::back}} to you as soon as I have the information you need.
Jane doesn't do anything at work. How does she get {{c1::away}} with it?
You should think more about the future. Don't look {{c1::back}} all the time.
Joe hasn't paid {{c1::back}} the money he borrowed.
I saw a man trying to break into a car. When he saw me, he ran {{c1::away}}.
These shoes are completely worn out. I'm going to throw them {{c1::away}}.
She wasn't very friendly. I smiled at her, but she didn't smile {{c1::back}}.
They used to live in the same town as us, but they moved {{c1::away}} a few years ago. I don't know where they live now.
